author: tomi2253
content: Hi, how do I create a new ERC

author: samwilsn
content:
Hey! The process is documented in detail here: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1

The summary is:

1. Open a discussion thread on [Ethereum Magicians](https://ethereum-magicians.org/) to get initial feedback;
2. Open a Draft pull request [here](https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/). We have [a template](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/eip-template.md) to help get you started.
